pages.body:
Liste de Tutoriels Zeronet
====================

Voiçi la version française de cette liste collaborative calquée sur le modèle des listes "awesome" sur Github, tout le monde peut contribuer à ce wiki, le but étant de recenser les tutoriels de la communauté.

[[zerotuto-zh|中文]] | [[Home|English]] | [[zerotuto-es|Español]] | [[zerotuto-ru|Русский]] | [[zerotuto-de|Deutsch]] | [[zerotuto-pt|Português]] | [[zerotuto-it|Italiana]]

Général
-------------

+ [zeronet.io](https://zeronet.io/fr)
+ [Zerowiki FR](/135qYXdNpf5kTWYuTJ8uautsUi91Bhvcck)

Blogs
----------

+ [Comment faire pour ouvrir un lien ZeroNet?](/1BzRecLuaj3SuKDFQ1RXPpaNyUXbVjV89X/?Post:6:Comment+faire+pour+ouvrir+un+lien+ZeroNet+)   
+ [Mise à jour Zeronet](/1BzRecLuaj3SuKDFQ1RXPpaNyUXbVjV89X/?Post:3:Mise+%C3%A0+jour+Zeronet)

Forums
--------------

+ [Comment ajouter l'ID id@ZeroVerse sur un Zeroblog](/1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/?Topic:10_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w/+ZeroBlog+Comment+ajouter+l+ID+id+ZeroVerse+sur+un+Zeroblog)
+ [Corriger l'erreur "Content sign failed: invalid private key" sur le tchat](/1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/?Topic:3_15xAFv6aHXqo5xdaSoTEi5pRNokskECJXU/Corriger+l+erreur+Content+sign+failed+invalid+private+key+sur+le+tchat)
   
Videos
-------------

+ [ZeroNet - Le réseau Web décentralisé ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-o_4gllWrk)
+ [Utiliser ZeroNet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gzoHcycf82k)
+ [Créer un site sur ZeroNet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mk1souFjbjg)


Clearnet
--------------

+ [Présentation](https://blog.notmyidea.org/static/zeronet-presentation-fr.pdf)
+ [Comment installer Zeronet sur Trisquel](https://trisquel.info/fr/wiki/comment-installer-zeronet-sur-trisquel-7-belenos)

Zeronet Tutorials
=============

This is a community curated repository of learning resources and tutorials related to Zeronet.
Feel free to organize and clean up this wiki. You can also contribute in other languages or add a new one:

[[zerotuto-zh|中文]] | [[zerotuto-fr|Français]] | [[zerotuto-es|Español]] | [[zerotuto-ru|Русский]] | [[zerotuto-de|Deutsch]] | [[zerotuto-pt|Português]] | [[zerotuto-it|Italiana]]

General
-------------

+ [Zeronet Docs](/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe)
+ [ZeroWiki](/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP)
+ [Zerosecurity](/zerosecurity.bit)

ZeroBlogs
-------------------

+ [ZeroNet Beginner’s Package](/blog.kaffie.bit/?Post:2:ZeroNet+Beginner%E2%80%99s+Package)
+ [ZeroNet - Tips, tricks and beginners' questions](/1GiJUPsfiS3LWCyZj5urW1Rt2q9WwRh4wB/?Post:15:ZeroNet+-+Tips,+tricks+and+beginners%27+questions)
+ [How to Create a Blog (Animation)](/1Ajp75FXAxdTzRiRTpdBgd4exvbo4gMW12/?Post:4:How+to+Create+a+Blog+%28Animation%29)
+ [Newbie things I've learned (Blog)](/1HBXiufU8RyFMREQa27yM92U329EXrfWvS/)
+ [Free .bit Domains for ZeroNet Sites](/1Ajp75FXAxdTzRiRTpdBgd4exvbo4gMW12/?Post:2:Free+.bit+Domains+for+ZeroNet+Sites)
+ [How to Create a Forum (Animation)](/1Ajp75FXAxdTzRiRTpdBgd4exvbo4gMW12/?Post:3:How+to+Create+a+Forum+%28Animation%29)
+ [How to create and modify a zeronet site](/1NDHM3er9eCVhtAc47tiGavEomjmrSZJDu)
+ [explore MAIL.zeroverse.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroblog.bit/?Post:52:explore+MAIL.zeroverse.bit)
+ [How To: custom ZeroNet addresses using Vanitygen](/13x71nc7fju6afMqpEPfcu3Gx9Z5hNhH48/?Post:5:How+To$)
+ [How to connect your .bit domain with your Zeronet site](/cryptonbits.bit/?Post:4:How+to+connect+your$)
+ [Using the Multiuser plugin](/eventi.bit/?Post:3:Using+the+Multiuser+plugin)
+ [Changing and encrypting ZeroIds](/1QLLPpowM6BWxKYKops1WkCafuFPhFBnAx?Post:4:Changing%20and%20encrypting%20ZeroIds)
+ [ZeroCommands](/1QLLPpowM6BWxKYKops1WkCafuFPhFBnAx/?Post:5:ZeroCommands)
+ [ZeroChat tutorial (new)](Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial)
+ [Decentralized p2p chat in 100 lines of code](/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new)
+ [protect yourselves: set a non-working proxy](/zeroblog.bit/?Post:60:protect+yourselves:+set+a+non-working+proxy)

Youtube Videos
----------------------------

+ [Introduction to Zeronet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NVg3s9bFQ0w)
+ [How to install Zeronet on Linux](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LCLFhCE91ec)
+ [How to install Zeronet on Mac](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ty2zOH3bjr0)
+ [How to download latest movies using Zeronet ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QoB-wspWc2w)
+ [How to get Namecoins for Free (for ZeroNet)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CnlpTZUOOj0)
+ [How Register a .bit Domain for ZeroNet ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IfVDZUX-0xk)

Clearnet Ressources
-----------------------------------

+ [Zeronet Docs](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
+ [ZeroNet | Introduction & Setup Tutorial](https://thetinhat.com/tutorials/darknets/zeronet.html)
+ [Quora](https://www.quora.com/search?q=zeronet)
+ [SuperUser](https://superuser.com/search?q=zeronet)
+ [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/)
+ [Decentralized p2p chat in 100 lines of code](https://decentralize.today/decentralized-p2p-chat-in-100-lines-of-code-d6e496034cd4#.5rski39ua)
+ [Selling bit domains using Zeronet](https://steemit.com/money/@tim-machinee/tutorial-selling-bit-domains-using-zeronet)
+ [Installing (and moving) ZeroNet to Debian Jessie with autostarting in screen](https://steemit.com/zeronet/@pztrn/installing-and-moving-zeronet-to-debian-jessie-with-autostarting-in-screen)
